name:
Claudia + Jane
mini peplum dress
description: A matching set of the Jane mini dress with the Claudia sleeveless flared top. Wear together for a chic layered peplum style mini dress! The versatile two piece dress design is perfect for travel- wear the pieces alone or together, dress up or down. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . The luxury in the design is all in the details- from the refined shaping, to the clean finishes. The front is faced, and back neckline edges are bound for a polished look. Our signature shaping flares from just above the waist in the front, making you look your best from every angle. In ultra soft, breathable, eco-conscious bamboo jersey, you'll feel as good as you look. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . Made in Canada 95% Viscose from Bamboo 5% Spandex Machine washable in cold water, gentle cycle . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . Length Guide: under 5'4"- just above knee 5'4"-5'8"- mid thigh 5'9" and taller- high thigh Model is 5'9", and wears an extra small. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . Have a question? Call 416-368-8228 or email contact@jessicarosedesign.com

name:
Jane
mini layering dress
description: Meet Jane, your adventurous new friend. In flirty mini length, this fitted bamboo jersey layering dress is a must-have wardrobe staple. You'll go everywhere with her. With tights, a sweater and boots on casual days, and with an elegant shawl for evenings out- you just can't go wrong! Designed to perfectly layer under our signature flared tops, this is the mini length base for creating your perfect Jessica Rose layered dress. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . The luxury in this dress is all in the details- from the refined shaping, to the clean finishes. The front of the dress is double layered to the hem, and back neckline edges are bound for a polished look. A back seam gives extra shaping along your curves. In ultra soft, breathable, eco-conscious bamboo jersey, you'll feel as good as you look. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . Made in Canada 95% Viscose from Bamboo 5% Spandex Machine washable in cold water, gentle cycle . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . Style Notes: - Blush pink is recommended for layering, as the pale colour is slightly transparent in the back when worn on its own. Length Guide: under 5'4"- just above knee 5'4"-5'8"- mid thigh 5'9" and taller- high thigh Model is 5'9", and wears an extra small. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . Have a question? name: Marion flared dress
description: The perfect dress that has women raving, around the world! The Marion flared dress (red dress shown) is figure flattering and it's clean minimalist design makes it easy to create different looks to suit your mood! Take this with you from a shopping trip in New York City to a romantic candlelit dinner- Ideal for travel, the breathable bamboo knit fabric packs lightly, and the versatile design of the dress will make putting together an outfit easy and fun- no matter where your adventures take you! With flares starting from above the waist, the cut is flattering to wear, comfortable, and the fabric drapes beautifully along the body. Available in black or red. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . Made in Canada 95% Viscose from Bamboo 5% Spandex Machine washable in cold water, gentle cycle . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . Have a question? Call 416-368-8228 or email contact@jessicarosedesign.com . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . Modelled by Tara-Brigitte Bhavnani of the British Royal Ballet. Photo by Tarzan Dan TDFoto.ca

name: Romantic flared cardigan
description:
A romantic twist on the classic cardigan! This design is cut higher in the front, and lower in the back for a flattering, lengthening silhouette. Matching black buttons keep it minimalist enough to wear with anything in your wardrobe! Ideal for layering, the breathable knit fabric is lightweight, and the versatile design of the cardigan works well in both the daytime and evening. *Available in black only. Please note that the buttons are slightly different than pictured. See third product image for new flat button style.
94% Viscose (from wood pulp) 6% Spandex * Machine washable in cold water
Click Here for Size Chart *This style is cut a bit larger to wear over something with sleeves. If your bust measurement falls between sizes, a size smaller is recommended.

name: Wintertime Birds Silk Scarf
description:
Lose yourself in this work of art. This versatile silk scarf mixes modern and classic elements to create an accessory, so unique and beautiful, you'll want to drape it on your wall when you're not wearing it. 

Discover the different ways to tie the scarf so you can show off each element of the picture. From the modern birds sitting atop oversize feathers, and wintered tree branches beneath dabbles of paint, you've got lots of options when it comes to showing off this silky heaven.

This luxurious scarf is as soft-to-the-touch as it is beautiful.

Colour options:
- dark powder (mauve with purple and orange)
- sand (beige with pink, yellow, and blue)

-100% sand washed silk
130x180cm

name: Feathers Journey Modal and Cashmere Scarf
description:
Rich deep hues overwhelm this cashmere and modal scarf. With images of feathers and balloons, this scarf is not only unique but versatile as well. 

Wrap the scarf around your neck any way you desire and show off the different colours and prints. Available in burgundy with sky blue. It's the perfect accessory to journey into the next season!

-90%modal, 10%cashmere
130x180cm

options.name: cat grey (black with burgundy and sky blue)

name: Moonlight Wool and Silk Scarf
description:
An abundance of blue shades drape this moonlight inspired wool and silk scarf. It's size, easily folding into a square among other styles, makes it an extremely versatile wardrobe must-have. 

Each corner of the scarf adopts different arrangements of the blue and white hues allowing you to display your favourite patterns, depending on your mood. 

Colour- blue cloud
-50%wool, 50%silk
110x200cm
From Danish label - BeckSndergaard

name: Field of Pansies Modal and Cashmere Scarf
description:
A field of pansies are printed on this gorgeous floral modal and cashmere scarf. With deep pinks, beautiful blues and alluring aubergines, this scarf makes the perfect winter accessory.

Although it flirts with spring, it's rich colours make it a cold season staple. Wrap the soft-to-the-touch scarf around you for warmth as you show off it's stylish appeal.

Colour- pink heart
90%modal, 10%cashmere
130x180cm
From Danish label - BeckSndergaard

name: Favourite Wool and Silk Scarf
description:
No one likes to play favourites, but it's hard to resist this accessory. The Favourite Scarf is simplicity at its best. 

Create an effortless and chic look by pairing this darling scarf with a bold print or keep it simple adding it to neutral layers. 

It falls with so much ease and elegance you're other accessories might get jealous of its stylish yet comfortable appeal. It's versatility, functionality and chic style definitely make it a wardrobe must-have. 

No wonder it's a favourite. 

-colour options- smokey gray, blush pink
90%wool, 10%silk
100x200cm
lightweight and semi-transparent

name: Cosabella Never Say Never Cutie Thong
description:
Made in Italy, these low rise floral lace thongs create a flawless, feminine and completely comfortable look. 

Their scalloped edges leave no panty lines and create no irritation. This luxe Italian lingerie is extremely soft, has a wide stretch band with a seamless cotton lined crotch panel and the thongs lay softly on the inside of the thigh, achieving ultimate comfort with a little added sex appeal. 

Never say never to something beautiful.

One size (fits 0-12)

name: Black Leather Foldable Flats
description:
A must have to any woman's wardrobe. Not only do these classic flats easily fold into a luxe black purse with accompany satin bag for your heels, they feature leather insoles, double cushioned soles, padded footbeds and suede cushioned heels. 

The perfect travel shoe that are comfortable enough for everyday wear. With subtle accents, including fish skin detailing and an elegant knot bow with silver toggles, they are sure to finish off your look in a simple and elegant way. 

Easily folding in the signature matching Cocorose purse, they're the ideal shoe to store in your office drawer, glove compartment or purse on a night out. 

. . . . .

Soft and foldable leather and fish skin two-tone ballerina flat.  

Supplied with Cocorose Londons signature travel purse and beautifully presented in a black and gold presentation box.

name: Leopard Print Foldable Flats
description:
Not only do these leopard print flats add a touch of flare to your outfit, they easily fold into a luxurious accompanying purse with a satin bag for your heels for when you decide to Cocorose it!

With leather insoles, double cushioned insides, padded footbeds and suede cushioned heels no one would blame you for slipping these heels on right away. 

It's hard to overlook these pumps' cute details, such as the caramel knot bow tie and silver toggles. Can you say meow?

. . . . .

Soft, printed pony hair ballerina flat. Double cushioned insoles, a non-slip outer sole and a petite heel. 

Supplied with Cocorose Londons signature travel purse and beautifully presented in a black and gold presentation box.

name: Silver Foldable Ballet Flats
description:
Finishing off your outfit with style doesn't mean you have to be four inches taller!

Get ready to dance the night away with these glamorous silver leather foldable flats, featuring leather insoles, double cushiononed and padded footbeds with suede cushioned heels. 

Slip your heels into the accompanying satin bag while you unfold your flats from their luxe purse and place your feet into totally comfortable, functional and stylish shoes.

. . . . .

Soft and foldable leather ballerina pump with a classic, hand-tied bow and silver knot detail. 

Supplied with Cocorose Londons signature travel purse and beautifully presented in a black and gold presentation box.

name: Gold Foldable Ballet Flats
description:
These gold leather foldable ballet flats can easily bring your outfit to the next level. 

Add them to your travel wardrobe or wear them to a wedding, your feet will love you as you dance the night away at the reception. 

They easily fold into the signature Cocorose London purse which can fit into your hand bag, suitcase or office drawer. Their leather insoles, double cushioned, padded footbeds and suede cushioned heels don't only make them comfortable but functional and stylish too!

. . . . .

Soft and foldable leather ballerina pump with a classic, hand-tied bow and silver knot detail. 

Supplied with Cocorose Londons signature travel purse and beautifully presented in a black and gold presentation box.

name: Black Foldable Ballet Flats
description:
Both functional and stylish, these black foldable flats are a staple in any woman's wardrobe. 

Easily folding into the signature matching Cocorose purse, they're the perfect shoes for storing in your car glove compartment, office drawer, or in your suitcase for when your feet need a break from high heels. 

Not only do these flats feature leather insoles, padded footbeds and suede cushioned heels, their classic look allows them to fit seamlessly into any outfit. 

Just slip your heels into the accompanying satin shoulder bag when you decide to Cocorose it!

name: Royal Ballet Foldable Flats - Giselle Grey
description:
From the exclusive Royal Ballet collection, these elegant foldable flats will add grace to your outfit. 

Their matching dove grey foldable purse and satin bag for your heels make them the perfect travel shoe, office alternative and dancing must-have. 

These stunning ballerina flats feature leather insoles, double cushioned insides, padded footbeds and suede cushioned heels for ultimate functional comfort while not missing out on style.

name: Cerise Pink Foldable Flats
description:
Taking off your heels for the night doesn't have to leave you with an unfinsihed outfit, if you Cocorose it! 

Add a pop of colour to any ensemble with these cerise foldable flats; perfect for travel or a night out, these feminine flats fold into a matching travel purse with accompanying satin bag for you to hide your heels in. 

Imagine slipping your feet into a pair of flats with luxurious suede cushioned insoles to dance the night away. You'll be the envy of all your friends as their feet throb in their stilettos.

name: Knightsbridge Black Foldable Ballet Flats
description:
The gemstone atop the satin bow isn't the only reason why these foldable flats are a gem. . . 

These shoes are just as comfortable as they are glamorous. With leather insoles, double cushioned insides, padded footbeds and suede cushioned heels they're a great alternative to your heels. 

Slip them on at a black-tie event, while you're traveling the globe or after a night of dancing. You definitely won't miss out on style in these foldable flats!
